name: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends
summary: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends was a game released for the Nintendo Entertainment System based after the famous Rocky and Bullwinkle show. It was a platform game that took the player through seven different levels, as well as a number of mini-games.
